article.title: Massachusetts Trade Resources
article.summary: Learn more about resources and organizations geared toward the promotion of trade in Massachusetts.
article.content:
​The Commonwealth of Massachusetts maintains many resources and organizations geared toward the promotion of trade and are available to assist you. A partial list of key organizations are identified below.

Massachusetts Export Center

​
​​The mission of the Massachusetts Export Center is to help companies throughout the Commonwealth achieve success in global markets, thereby contributing to economic growth in the state.Our goal is to meet the complex needs of exporters by developing and providing targeted, high-impact services delivered through a statewide network of international trade professionals.

Massachusetts Office of International Trade and Investment

​
The Massachusetts Office of International Trade & Investment (MOITI) works to expand the Massachusetts economy by marketing the state's business internationally.

Massachusetts Department of Agricultural Resources

​
The Massachusetts Department of Agricultural Resources works with growers and food processors to help them develop domestic and international markets through counseling, technical assistance, and referrals. As a part of this process, the Department coordinates market research and promotion efforts with other governmental agencies and an extensive group of agricultural trade officers abroad.​
article.seometadatadescription: Learn more about resources and organizations geared toward the promotion of trade in Massachusetts.
